resources.string: If you have experienced Call Drop during any of your call, you can register your \ninformation here.
Kindly note that information can be registered with the same mobile number on which Call Drop happened.
Note: If department finds your information misleading then action may be initiated against you as per Law.
Department of Telecommunications\nMinistry of Communications\nGovernment of India
NOTE:- All fields marked with an asterisk(*) are mandatory
